SimpleMetering

class st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.SimpleMetering
ID: number

0x0702 the ID of this cluster

NAME: str

“SimpleMetering” the name of this cluster

attributes: st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.SimpleMeteringServerAttributes or st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.SimpleMeteringClientAttributes
commands: st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.SimpleMeteringServerCommands or st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.SimpleMeteringClientCommands
types: st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.SimpleMeteringTypes

st.zigbee.ZigbeeMessageTx

configure_reporting(device, min_rep_int, max_rep_int, rep_change)

Construct a st.zigbee.ZigbeeMessageTx to configure this attribute for reporting on a device

Parameters

  • device (st.zigbee.Device) –

  • min_rep_int (number or st.zigbee.data_types.Uint16) – the minimum interval allowed between reports of this attribute

  • max_rep_int (number or st.zigbee.data_types.Uint16) – the maximum interval allowed between reports of this attribute

  • rep_change (st.zigbee.data_types.Uint48) – The amount of change of the attribute to trigger a report

Returns

containing a ConfigureReporting body

Return type
